title: Celestia’s TIA Token Pops 22% as Staking, ‘Modular’ Narrative Gains Favor
description: Staking TIA on native platforms is yielding between 15% to 17%, minus fees, to users, boosting demand for the cryptocurrency.

title: Logan Paul Promises To Refund Disgruntled CryptoZoo Investors
description: YouTuber and social media influencer Logan Paul has promised to refund disgruntled investors of his ambitious CryptoZoo NFT game as long as they don’t sue him after they get the refund.

title: FTX and Alameda Transfer $4.17M in CRO Tokens to Coinbase Amid Ongoing Controversy
description: Cryptocurrency exchange platform FTX and its sister company, Alameda Research, have raised eyebrows in the crypto community with a series of transfers to Coinbase totaling $4.17 million in CRO tokens.  This move comes amidst ongoing controversy surrounding FTX’s repayment plans to its creditors and legal troubles involving its co-founder, Sam Bankman-Fried. FTX and Alameda’s recent […]

title: Solana and Optimism holders exploring Pushd presale

description:

title: Celsius Announces Ethereum Unstaking Plans, Moves 10K ETH to Coinbase
description:
Cryptocurrency lending platform Celsius Network, which filed for bankruptcy in 2022, recently tweeted plans to unstake some of its holdings in Ethereum (ETH). In a series of tweets, Celsius stated it would be recalling and rebalancing assets as part of strategic preparations regarding potential future asset distributions. Celsius suspended customer withdrawals in mid-2022 due to […]

The post Celsius Announces Ethereum Unstaking Plans, Moves 10K ETH to Coinbase appeared first on Coin Edition.

title: Bitcoin Spot ETF Approval Has 88% of Financial Advisors Waiting To Invest
description:
Amid the anticipations of a Bitcoin spot ETF approval, several financial advisors interested in Bitcoin (BTC) across the United States expressed a cautious stance in the crypto market. A recent survey shows that 88% of advisors intend to invest in BTC, but only after the approval of spot Bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs). The sixth annual […]

title: Analyst Who Nailed 2022 Crypto Bottom Issues Bitcoin Alert, Says BTC Could Nosedive by Over 35% – Here’s Why
description:
A cryptocurrency analyst and trader is warning that one event could trigger Bitcoin (BTC) to collapse by double digits.
